price: Nos Jardins do Éden, que O Misericordioso prometeu a Seus servos, que creram no Invisível. Por certo, Sua promessa se concretizará.
arabic: جَنَّٰتِ عَدۡنٍ ٱلَّتِي وَعَدَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ عِبَادَهُۥ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ وَعۡدُهُۥ مَأۡتِيّٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: jannāti ʿadnin allatī waʿada al-raḥmānu ʿibādahu bil-ghaybi innahu kāna waʿduhu matiyyan
